title.rendered: “Decoding the IDF and Shin Bet’s Joint Operation: Elimination of a Senior Hamas Terror Strategist”

content.rendered:
Joint message to the IDF spokesperson and the Shin Bet spokesperson:

He advanced major terrorist activities in the strip and planned attacks on Israeli territory: IDF and Shin Bet eliminated a senior in the internal security mechanism of the Hamas terror organization.

Following intelligence guided by the Military Intelligence Directorate and the Shin Bet, Air Force fighter jets eliminated this week (Wednesday) in the south of the Gaza strip Akram Abd Alrahman Hsein Salame’, a senior in the internal security mechanism of the Hamas terror organization.

Akram served in several key roles in the organization, including deputy head of the Khan Yunis district.

As part of his role, he was engaged in advancing major terrorist activities in the Strip, with the aim of disrupting IDF activity and was responsible for the planning and execution of significant attacks in the State of Israel.

Attached is the ID of Akram Abd Alrahman Hsein Salame’, a senior in the internal security mechanism of the Hamas terror organization: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC06042024924724897
